name: ServiceContainer
description: Represents a container inside which the service instance is run.

executorId.description: The ID of the executor on which this container is running

serviceId.description: The ID of the service this container belongs to

groupId.description: The ID of the service group this container belongs to

currentDeploymentId.description: SHA1 hash representing the deployment and environment. Used to calculate if container is running the expected deployment of code and environment variables

applicationPort.description: Routable Port to application is listening on
